content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)

### Empty Production Line (x=5.5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (5.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5 to 16, y=26.5-35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5, 35.5)
- Boiler at position (7.0, 35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5, 35.5)
- Two pipe groups connecting components:
  - Water pipe system at (5.5, 33.5) connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam pipe system at (9.5, 35.5) connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles spanning from (0.5, 26.5) to (13.5, 33.5)
- Non-functional offshore pump at position (-5.5, 26.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure required crafting materials are in inventory before attempting to craft (e.g., small electric poles require wood and copper cable)
- Check for required fuel (coal) in inventory before attempting to insert into machines

### Connection and Placement Errors
- Ensure all fluid-carrying entities (pipes, offshore pumps, boilers, steam engines) are properly connected to form complete systems
- Some offshore pumps are not connected to any fluid system - ensure proper placement and connections

### Power System Issues
- Power system showing 0 voltage - verify fuel supply to boiler and proper steam flow through the system
- Ensure boilers have adequate coal supply to generate steam
- Check that steam connections between boiler and steam engine are complete and functional
